workflow.description: Review the workflow. Research/review the relevant Marlin Configuration guidelines.
Choose the target printer configuration from the dropdown menu. If the default environment text is RED, click 'copy env to platformio.ini'.
Select one objective at a time and review the flash card for keywords and background info.

workflow.step: Load the file you need to edit
workflow.description: Select either Configuration.h or Configuration_adv.h to edit. Choose whether to load the base configuration file, a configuration example file, or browse and select another file.

Find and edit the relevant configuration settings. Start with Keywords from flash card. Hide Comments and type keywords, to filter the displayed lines. View in Context to understand a line in context.
Save Edit, to commit your changes.  Save File to either: Overwrite the Base file directly, or Browse and SaveAs, elsewhere.
Check the boxes for Configuration.h OK and Configuration_adv.h OK and ensure the platformio environment is green.
When the Build Firmware button is green, click it to build your firmware. The location of the bin file will be reported in that terminal window.
